name: Star-Struck
meaning: The Star-Struck emoji represents amazement, excitement, and joyful admiration. It conveys being impressed, thrilled, or extremely happy about something or someone.

when_to_use: Use this emoji when expressing amazement, excitement, admiration, or joyful surprise.
when_not_to_use: Avoid using it in serious, neutral, or negative conversations where excitement may feel inappropriate.
